data.title: Pretty expensive
data.text: Food so so, tomato basil soup very little flavor. Biscuit good. Service friendly and efficient. But very expensive for sandwich and soup comb

data.title: Fabulous bakery, lunch and brunch
data.text: Excellent food and staff.  In addition to the take out counter, there is a lovely, high ceilinged restaurant next door with, wait for it, crystal chandeliers, mirrors on the wall,  and sound baffles.  You can have a private conversation!  The Blue Door celebrated its 5th year this past weekend.. congratulations on your continued success.

data.title: Quality customer service, skimpy portions
data.text: Atmosphere was Northwest casual and customer service was great. Food was okay and portions for some menu items were skimpy. Fun place to meet with friends.

data.title: God, I thought La Bottega was FuFu!
data.text:
Just likes its neighbor down the street...A bunch of chicks sittin' 'round talking.  This place seems to appeal to the female crowd who like to drag out their reluctant companions...and their credit cards...well, you know the rest! 

I thought I'd entered the twilight zone with a lighter fair.  The difference being their signature bread and deserts.  After three trips in response to good reviews, I sill couldn't obtain a simple baguette.  Always some lame excuse.  On each of these trips, I walked away with a disappointing sample of their pastry, which the cashier revealed many were purchased elswhere, and just sold in this garden party,  

I've long grown tired of wannabees comforting themselves for the foolish amounts of money they spend on things they have no business mentioning to the general population at all.

...as I've said many times before..."that they just don't know any better."

data.title: Coffee and bowl of soup
data.text: I had a normally good coffee but the soup was delicious, I had creamy mushroom soup they only make on  Friday and it was exquisite without overeating or breaking the bank.

data.title: Fresh Ingredients
data.text: Another great place to stop for fresh wholesome food in Uptown Vancouver. Can be very busy on a nice weekend day, but midweek usually has no waits.

data.title: Creative and tasty menu items
data.text: Enjoyed a birthday brunch with a dear friend on Sunday. Had to wait about 6-8 minutes for a table, but had time to drool over the display of desserts for sale. Service was fantastic from beginning to end. Our meals were served quickly, our coffee was fresh and bold. The meals were tasty but not exotic. For standard fare these were above average. My only complaint was the close location of the tables and chairs. I'll stop in soon for one of those desserts.

data.title: Peaceful
data.text: Sensational! Great service! Fresh salads! Exceptional! Worth every dime! Easy access parking! Iced tea Drinks are the best in town too!

data.title: exceptional bakery and cafe
data.text: Bleu door is a jewel of a café in uptown Vancouver. Their baked goods are delicious, from cookies to unique pastries...have loved everything I have tried here. Also, a great stop for lunch or weekend brunch.

data.title: What a treat!
data.text: This place is a great find in uptown Vancouver.  We stopped by for coffee and a roll and ended up buying a couple loaves of bread and baked goodies for later.  The sandwich menu looks great and we will definitely be back!

data.title: Lunch in downtown Vancouver
data.text: We found the food to be very good, as was the service.  We arrived shortly after the lunch hour had begun and had to wait about 20 minutes for a table.  The restaurant is small and crowded and noisy.

data.title: Discovered by accident.
data.text: Jumped off of Interstate 5 for a bite to eat.  hoping to avoid fast food and pub food, I cruised Main Street and found this place.  Had a fine lunch...a chicken sandwich with apples and grapes; my wife had a BLT with avocado.  Scrumptious.

data.title: Great Ruben Sandwich
data.text: If your in uptown Vancouver  around lunch time on a Friday or Saturday, stop in  at the Blu Door for one of their specialty sandwiches. My favorite is the Ruben.

data.title: Yummy in my tummy
data.text: You will not be disappointed having lunch here. Everything I have tried on the menu is excellent. I only gave 4 stars because it's a bit expensive for lunch and there are no extras if you order a sandwich that is all you get - no chips or salad or even a pickle.   But be sure to order something sweet too cuz it will be delicious.

data.title: Come for the Bakery, Stay for the Breakfast
data.text:
A really great selection of home made baked goods, and a frequently updated selection of great breakfast fare.

We've been here often since they expanded to offer breakfast. Never a disappointment, good service, coffee and reasonable prices.

if there's a downside it is that it's so good people will be waiting to get in. Earlier arrival nets faster seating.

data.title: Please expand again!
data.text: I love this cafe!!! Problem is it's too popular. Soups are yummy, sandwiches are so unique and served with a tasty side instead of the usual heap of greasy fries and I always save room for desert. All the classics can be found here from creme brûlée to cheesecake, carrot cake, and on the list goes with new offerings scattered in among the old standbys, all superb!

data.title: Amazing desserts and pastries and great food!
data.text: Walk up to the outside bar area or go inside for a table to enjoy the food. You can't go wrong with this place - Amazing food and great service.

data.title: The MOST delicious everything!!!
data.text: Hands downs the best cookies I've ever tasted. And their cheesecake.... Oh my! Literally everything in the menu is worth a try.

data.title: The Bleu Door has expanded
data.text: Another visit to a good local gem, on our way to CA, made a special stop. It is just five minutes off I-5. Even nicer now with comfy indoor seating and the baked goods and menu is still great. Had a great late breakfast and hit the road with a sack of baked goods.

data.title: Great baked goods plus lunch
data.text: Nice place to go with the girls for lunch. Good menu, but save room for some yummy bakery items for dessert.
